it.polito.computervision.gestures

Class AbstractGesture

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polito.computervision.gestures.AbstractGesture
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Gesture
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ClickGesture

    public abstract class AbstractGesture
extends java.lang.Object
implements Gesture
    Implements the common functionality of a gesture (getters and GestureState update). Concrete implementations will need only to override the doUpdateState(Collection, Collection) abstract method.
    Author:
    giovanni

      • doUpdateState

        protected abstract GestureState doUpdateState(java.util.Collection<HandData> hands,
                         java.util.Collection<HandData> gestureHands)
        Concrete gestures must implement this method. The semantics are the same of Gesture.updateState(Collection, Collection).
        Parameters:
        hands - The HandData being tracked during this frame
        gestureHands - The HandData this gesture is tracking
        Returns:
        The GestureState this gesture is in after the update.
